climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【High Quality】OMERAI washable rugs 5'x7' are expertly machine-woven with non slip TPE Backing. The non slip backing can effectively keeps the area rug in a stable position and prevents slipping. The machine washable rug used durable fibers for maximum durability, stain resistant and virtually non-shedding.

【Stain Resistant Surface】Our machine washable area rug 5'x7' has been treated with professional splash and pollution prevention to ensure that liquids will not penetrate after spilled on the area rug, including coffee, wine, milk, juice, pet urine and so on.

【Machine Washable】The area rugs for living room are easy to clean. When the abstract rug is dirty and needs cleaning, it can be cleaned quickly and easily by throwing into the washing machine. You can also clean it with a vacuum cleaner or wipe it with a wet rag.

【Safe and Secure】Our machine washable rugs have OEKO-TEX Standard 100 certification to ensure the quality of products. Safe and friendly. You can use the area rug with peace of mind.OMERAI abstract area rug is an ideal base for high traffic areas such as the entryway, living room, dining room, kitchen, and hallways.

【Trendy Abstract Design】Modern abstract rug design adds a different artistic element and collocation style to your home decor. NOTE: Machine washable area rugs may contain temporary creases upon arrival, allow time for creases to flatten and settle. Due to the different screen displays, it is normal to have a slight difference in color.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: OMERAI Modern Abstract Washable Rug-Bright Your Life
Modern abstract rug design adds a different artistic element to your home Previous page Next page

High Quality The machine washable rug used durable fibers for maximum durability, stain resistant and virtually non-shedding. Non Slip TPE Backing Our washable rug is designed with a non-slip TPE backing, which can effectively keeps the area rug in a stable position and prevents slipping. Ultra Thin Super low pile thin floor area rug suits for high traffic areas like living room, hallway, kitchen. Waterproof Our machine washable rug has been treated with professional splash prevention to ensure that liquids will not penetrate after spilled on the carpet.

Various Colors Machine Washable Use Vacuum Cleaner Non Slip Pet Friendly Foldable Rug Various Colors&Sizes Machine Washable Use Vacuum Cleaner Non Slip Pet Friendly Foldable Rug Various Colors&Sizes Machine Washable Use Vacuum Cleaner Non Slip Pet Friendly Foldable Rug Various Colors&Sizes Machine Washable Use Vacuum Cleaner Non Slip Pet Friendly Foldable Rug Various Colors&Sizes

Easy to Care You can put the area rug directly in the washing machine, which provides endless convenience for every lifestyle. This washable rug can also be cleaned with a vacuum cleaner, broom or rag. NOTE: Please let the rug dry completely after cleaning, which can prolong the service life of the area rug.

Is this area rug washable? Yes. OMERAI area rugs for living room is foldable, so you can simply and quickly throw it into the washing machine for cleaning. You can also clean the carpet with a vacuum cleaner or wipe it with a wet rag. Will this rug make my dog sensitive and uncomfortable? No. Our washable rugs meet OEKO-TEX certification standards which are perfect for families with kids and pets. Safe and nontoxic. Do I need to buy extra anti-skid pads? No. OMERAI washable rugs are expertly machine-woven with non slip TPE Backing. Whether you have wooden floors or tiles at home, our area rugs are very non-slip. Will it fade when used for a long time? No. The machine washable rug used durable fibers for maximum durability, stain resistant and virtually non-shedding. Due to the different screen displays, it is normal to have a slight difference in color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the colors and the quality
reviews.reviewText: I love the colors in this area rug. The quality is good and it lays flat without any creases or any warping or curling at the edges. The material is thin but feels very comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this rug
reviews.reviewText: So I’m getting ready to start potty training my daughter and I thought I need a rug that’s easy to wash this thing you can throw it in the washer I mean not my washer and dryer at the house obviously but you know I can go to the laundromat where they have those gigantic washers just pop that bad boy in but I love the fact that it’s thin Because whenever it gets soiled, it’s easy to clean and it’s not like it’s deep deep soiled in the carpet because it’s a thin material I love it it’s beautiful goes awesome with my Ottoman. I was actually thinking about replacing my carpets but then I was like I can save it for another time because this was a quick and easy fix. I cannot be happier if you’re thinking about it, go ahead order the rug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got tired of trying to clean traditional rugs. We have 3 dogs. I decided to try something different. Rug is very attractive. If you you are looking for something thick and soft this is not for you. It is made with some kind of duck/canvas material and thin. I put a rubber waterproof floor pad underneath to protect wood floors. Had on of our dogs vomit on it already. It was dry by the time I found it when I returned from work. Cleaned off the large debris, used a toothbrush and some Dawn, cleaned up beautifully. If you are looking for something attractive and are a pet owner would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s just as beautiful as in the picture. It’s soft but not hefty or thick. It’s a great purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought this rug for my kitchen to add a bit more to my decor. The material is great! It’s easy to clean which I love. Designed exactly as pictured. I felt the rug was definitely worth the price I paid for it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t purchase unless you don’t mind throwing away your money
reviews.reviewText: Totally disliked! Poor poor quality, I couldn’t even clean it. It’s not a rug it’s a throw mat that’s big. I’m f your choosing to buy for the purpose of letting your dogs play and lay in it fine then! Just be aware it’s uncleanable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have a huge Alaskan Malamute who brings a lot of hair, dirt, and dust into the house. This rug is absolutely a life saver. It is thin and the print is just that, but it’s stylish and comfortable to walk on. Stains come off easy with a wipe and windex. Once a few weeks I throw it in the washer AND dryer (on low) and have no issues. Absolutely love this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not what we were expecting
reviews.reviewText: Sorry to say we’ll be returning this item, I really like the colors and design, however I guess partly bc it’s machine washable it’s very thin and was not what we were expecting. It barely looks like a rug, it looks cheap. Also via my picture, I noticed fraying after only 24 hrs.
